root.name: Star Ocean: Second Evolution
root.description: OverviewSecond Evolution is a remake of Second Story (originally on PS1), similar to the remake of the original Star Ocean, titled First Departure. Some enhancements in this version include: redone artwork and cutscenes by Production I.G, re-recorded voiceovers from new actors, a new playable character, new ending, and a refined combat system.

similar_games.game: Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology 2
